channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Project Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Project Server

item.title: CVE-2018-8254|2024-08-05T06:46:13.969Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20project%20server
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Microsoft SharePoint Server does not properly sanitize a specially crafted web request to an affected SharePoint server, aka "Microsoft SharePoint Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Project Server, Microsoft SharePoint. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-8252.
